magicitems.destroyFlavorText: reaches 0 charges: it crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

description.value:
At 3rd level, you choose an archetype that you strive to emulate, such as the Hunter. Your choice grants you features at 3rd level and again at 7th, 11th, and 15th level.

Ranger Archetypes

@UUID[Compendium.5e-complete.5e-subclasses.3x2aq3aVpXs5hKqh]{Beast Master}

The Beast Master archetype embodies a friendship between the civilized races and the beasts of the world.

@UUID[Compendium.5e-complete.5e-subclasses.i5qYdDhqoztfu2O6]{Drakewarden}

The Beast Master archetype embodies a friendship between the civilized races and the beasts of the world.

@UUID[Compendium.5e-complete.5e-subclasses.Wjbf521s9HUaSP4v]{Fey Wanderer}

A fey mystique surrounds you, thanks to the boon of an archfey, the shining fruit you ate from a talking tree, the magic spring you swam in, or some other auspicious event.

@UUID[Compendium.5e-complete.5e-subclasses.JjPE3VtVaEnB6kdc]{Gloom Stalker Conclave}

Gloom stalkers are at home in the darkest places: deep under the earth, in gloomy alleyways, in primeval forests, and wherever else the light dims.

@UUID[Compendium.5e-complete.5e-subclasses.LGIbM2bmTKGniqgF]{Horizon Walker Conclave}

Horizon walkers guard the world against threats that originate from other planes or that seek to ravage the mortal realm with otherworldly magic.

@UUID[Compendium.5e-complete.5e-subclasses.1HjqsxkROWb5Kujm]{Hunter Conclave}

Some rangers seek to master weapons to better protect civilization from the terrors of the wilderness.

@UUID[Compendium.5e-complete.5e-subclasses.YqLaFEDLBBo89sPz]{Monster Slayer Conclave}

You have dedicated yourself to hunting down creatures of the night and wielders of grim magic.

@UUID[Compendium.5e-complete.5e-subclasses.P0ZzoaXImVm8OISG]{Swarmkeeper}

Feeling a deep connection to the environment around them, some rangers reach out through their magical connection to the world and bond with a swarm of nature spirits.
